title: FS/FT (16) SGC Graded T210's Series 1, 2, 3, 5, & 7 Prices Lowered
author: bnorth

posts.post_title: FS/FT (16) SGC Graded T210's Series 1, 2, 3, 5, & 7 Prices Lowered
posts.post_content:
All forms of payment accepted. Regular PayPal add $1.50 per card to cover fees. Shipping is a flat $3 if you buy 1 card or all of them. 

Looking to trade for Series 3 Ft Worth players. I also need these collector grade 55 Bowmans 179, 201, 235, 242, 277. 283, 286, 291, 293, 302, 307, and 320.

Bump for price drop. I would also trade multiples for lower grade raw/graded T206's with rare backs I need.

$520 shipped for the entire 16 card lot bump.

If you have something to trade make an offer, I collect a little bit of everything
